title: 205. Andy & DJ CTI: Flu Making A Comeback, Black People Rejecting Transgender Claims & Higher Pay For Non-White Teachers
itunes:title: 205. Andy & DJ CTI: Flu Making A Comeback, Black People Rejecting Transgender Claims & Higher Pay For Non-White Teachers
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss flu making a comeback after an unusual year off, the poll that showed black Americans rejecting the multiple genders claim by the transgender community, and a Minnesota school board approving a plan to pay more money to non-white teachers.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss flu making a comeback after an unusual year off, the poll that showed black Americans rejecting the multiple genders claim by the transgender community, and a Minnesota school board approving a plan to pay more money to non-white teachers.
